text: Sebastião Lopes de Calheiros e Meneses (24 January 1816 – 20 November 1899) was a Portuguese colonial administrator. He was the governor of Cape Verde and of Angola. He was born on 24 January 1816 in Geraz do Lima, northern Portugal. His father was Pedro Lopes de Calheiros e Meneses.Sebastião Lopes de Calheiros e Meneses, Ponte de Lima cultural He succeeded António Maria Barreiros Arrobas as governor of Cape Verde on 28 March 1858, and was succeeded by Januário Correia de Almeida in June 1860. He succeeded Carlos Augusto Franco as governor of Angola in February 1861, and was succeeded by José Baptista de Andrade in September 1862. He was Minister of Public Works in the government of Sá da Bandeira (1868-1869).Governo de Sá da Bandeira (1868–1869), politipedia.pt He died in Viana do Castelo on 20 November 1899. ==See also== *List of colonial governors of Cape Verde *List of colonial governors of Angola ==References== Category:1816 births Category:1899 deaths Category:People from Viana do Castelo Category:Colonial heads of Cape Verde Category:Governors of Portuguese Angola Category:Government ministers of Portugal Category:Portuguese colonial governors and administrators
